title: Mirqur DEX - Improved LP Interface
description: Most DEXs don't offer liquidity-pool infrastructure that allows liquidity-providers to flexibly, easily and safely manage their assets
solution: Mirqur combines portfolio and range pool variants to increase profitability/flexibility of liquidity provision.
experience: Our team members have degrees in Math, AI, Economics, International Business and have worked with Amazon, Microsoft and startups alike.
